name: Ewok Bow
Lore: 'Primitive weapon. Effective in large volleys. Imperial troops are not prepared for such simple tactics.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on your Ewok. May target a character or creature using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Add 1 for each other Ewok present who is armed with an Ewok Bow. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.',
